articles.author: Wesley Messamore
articles.title: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink Shares Thoughts on a Bitcoin (BTC): Bull Run Ahead? - CryptoPotato
articles.description: BTC price topped $30K this week. BlackRock chief Larry Fink called it a "flight to quality" amid positive Bitcoin ETF buzz and a high-profile FTX trial in swing.
articles.content:
TL’DR
  • BlackRock CEO Larry Fink praises the Bitcoin network, citing pent-up interest in crypto and a flight to quality as drivers of the recent rally.
  • Confidence in SEC approval of a … [+2981 chars]
